members.name: IDBRequest.error
members.description: Returns an error in the event of an unsuccessful request, indicating what went wrong.

members.name: IDBRequest.result
members.description: Returns the result of the request. If the the request failed and the result is not available, an InvalidStateError exception is thrown.

members.name: IDBRequest.source
members.description: The source of the request, such as an IDBIndex or an IDBObjectStore. If no source exists (such as when calling IDBFactory.open), it returns null.

members.name: IDBRequest.readyState
members.description: The state of the request. Every request starts in the pendingÂ state. The state changes to done when the request completes successfully or when an error occurs.

members.name: IDBRequest.transaction
members.description: The transaction for the request. This property can be null for certain requests, for example those returned from IDBFactory.open unless an upgrade is needed. (You're just connecting to a database, so there is no transaction to return).

members.name: IDBRequest.onerror
members.description: The event handler for the error event.

members.name: IDBRequest.onsuccess
members.description: The event handler for the success event.
